system.descriptionText: Deployed from space. Choose location, scatter 2d10 metres. Shooting at vehicle being orbitally deployed has -30 to hit. Once landed, must wait a Full Round before disembarking, firing, or moving.

description.value: Deployed from space. Choose location, scatter 2d10 metres. Shooting at vehicle being orbitally deployed has -30 to hit. Once landed, must wait a Full Round before disembarking, firing, or moving.
